meanings.sent1: The gallanting knight rescued the princess from the dragon.
meanings.sent2: The soldiers showed their gallanting spirit in battle.
meanings.sent3: The gallanting hero never hesitated to help those in need.
meanings.sent4: Her gallanting actions inspired others to be courageous.
meanings.sent5: The gallanting firefighter saved the kitten from the burning building.

meanings.sent1: He was gallanting his date to the fancy restaurant.
meanings.sent2: The gentleman was gallanting the lady to the ball.
meanings.sent3: She enjoyed being gallanting around town by her suitor.
meanings.sent4: The prince was gallanting the princess through the royal gardens.
meanings.sent5: The young man was gallanting his crush to the school dance.

meanings.sent1: The gallanting gentleman held the door open for everyone.
meanings.sent2: She appreciated his gallanting gestures of respect.
meanings.sent3: The gallanting boy offered his seat to the elderly lady.
meanings.sent4: His gallanting behavior towards others earned him admiration.
meanings.sent5: The gallanting act of kindness made her smile.
